IRS990EZ.PrimaryExemptPurposeTxt: SERVICES INCLUDE: RESEARCH-BASED INTERVENTIONS AND PREVENTIONS TO SAVE LIVES HELPING INDIVIDUALS THROUGH THE MOST DIFFICULT EMOTIONAL SITUATIONS; IN ORDER TO ACCOMPLISH A STABILIZATION FOR THE BEGINNING OF THEIR HEALING PROCESS. HELPING TO KEEP AND CONTINUE PUBLIC AWARENESS OF ACUTE MENTAL HEALTH HELP TO REDUCE ALL FORMS OF VIOLENCE IN FAMILIES. SUCH AS EMOTIONAL PROBLEMS, EATING DISORDERS, SSEXUAL IDENTITY QUESTIONS, PPHYSICAL DISABILITIES, BAD OR UNHEALTHY HABITS, ADDICTIONS, BBEREAVEMENT, AND PARENTING ETC. SERVICES ARE PROVIDED AS PER SCHEDULE AND WHERE THE CLIENTS WISH TO DO CONSULTATION; OR AT CCFS PROSPECTIVE HOME BASE. CCFS WILL BUILD ON THE EXPERIENCES OF OTHER COMMUNITIES SIMILAR TO OURS; AND TO USE THEM AS MODELS OF STRENGTH OR BACK UP. MISSION STATEMENT TO PROVIDE QUALITY INTERVENTION/PREVENTION SERVICES TO CRISIS YOUTH AND FAMILIES, AS WELL AS TO ENCOURAGING A HOLISTIC HEALTH IN THE COMMUNITY.
